[Premiere] Video works

Sep 5, 2020

works created for a video I course

clip montage

watch

a montage of about one minute using clips of only one or a few seconds each; presented without sound

clip montage + sound

watch

reworked the sound of the montage using no audio from the original videos and using only found sounds explored topics of foley and demonstration through sound

document: how we hear

watch

prompt was to create a video documenting something; anything. for this video i chose to document the music my friends enjoy, and why.

video story: revisiting+

watch

prompt was to simply create a video around five minutes in length that tells a story with original footage and audio

monodrama: seeds

watch

prompt was to create a monodrama based of a craigslist missed connections ad
